email_content:
To whom it may concern,

I am writing to express my extreme dissatisfaction with the service we received on our recent shipment.

Order Reference: #7E9AECCC
Delivery Date Promised: December 8, 2025
Actual Delivery Date: December 15, 2025 (7 DAYS LATE!)

Not only was the shipment delayed by an entire week without any proactive communication from your team, but when it finally arrived, we discovered that 8 out of 50 boxes were severely damaged. The contents are completely unusable, resulting in a loss of approximately €3,200.

This is absolutely unacceptable. We had to expedite alternative arrangements at significant additional cost to meet our customer commitments. Our reputation has been damaged because of your poor service.

We are demanding:
1. Full refund for the damaged goods (€3,200)
2. Compensation for the late delivery
3. Reimbursement for the expedited shipping costs we incurred (€850)
4. A written explanation of what went wrong
5. Immediate improvement measures to prevent this happening again

We have been your customer for 3 years and this is not the first time we've experienced issues. If this is not resolved satisfactorily within 48 hours, we will be forced to terminate our contract and seek legal advice.

I expect an immediate response from senior management.

Regards,
Erik Solberg
Operations Director
Nordic Wholesale Group AS
Phone: +47 22 12 34 56
